log_in.title: Log In
log_in.invalid_credentials: Your username or password is invalid

forgot_password.title: Forgot password?
forgot_password.message: Enter the address you used to sign up, and we will send you an Email containing instructions to reset your password.

fail.title: Failed to update password
fail.message: This reset password link has expired. Please request a new one.

confirmation_sent.title: Confirmation sent
confirmation_sent.message: We have sent you password reset instructions to your email.

light_director.title: Lyt Color Picker
light_director.info: All LYT devices are currently under festival control.

success.title: List of LYT Devices
success.strongest_signal_info: First device has the strongest signal

fail.title: List of LYT Devices
fail.info: No LYT devices were detected, please try scanning again.

connection_in_progress.title: Connecting to LYT
connection_in_progress.please_wait_info: Trying to connect to your device.

fail.title: Failed to update account
fail.message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

fail.title: Failed to change password
fail.message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

flash.title: Flash
flash.info: Use the flash feature to confirm you are connected to the right LYT device.

connection_failed.title: Bluetooth connection failed
connection_failed.info: To run this application bluetooth must be turned on.

turn_on.ios: Please enable Bluetooth from your settings.

location_services_disabled.title: Location Services
location_services_disabled.info: To run this application location services must be enabled.

info.title: Connection Failed
info.message: We were not able to connect to selected device. Please try again.

alert.title: Delete LYT Account?
alert.message: Deleting your LYT account will prevent you from accessing your LYT device.
